job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of developing and improving IT systems and platforms, which falls under traditional software engineering and infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Managing the lifecycle of systems and software is a fundamental aspect of software engineering and IT operations.

soft_skills.phrase: You are able to work in an autonomous and structured way
soft_skills.justification: Working autonomously and in a structured way points to taking ownership and initiative in managing tasks and projects.

soft_skills.phrase: you take initiative and collaborate well within team and with other colleagues
You carry projects from the start to a maintainable solution including knowledge sharing
soft_skills.justification: This describes the end-to-end responsibility for a project, including ensuring its maintainability and sharing knowledge, which are software engineering practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Your communication and coordination skills are developed well
soft_skills.justification: Directly refers to communication and coordination skills.

soft_skills.phrase: You are enthusiastic, energetic and take ownership
soft_skills.justification: Taking ownership is a key aspect of innovation and responsibility in a role.
This phrase indicates a focus on achieving outcomes and solving problems effectively.
Creativity and being investigative are core to problem-solving and finding new solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: You love to challenge people in a positive way
soft_skills.justification: Challenging others positively is a form of constructive communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development. That is why you decide how, what and when you learn.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes self-directed learning and continuous development.

soft_skills.phrase: We have more than 200 digital training courses with which you can work on professional and personal goals.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the availability of resources for professional growth and learning.

soft_skills.phrase: You keep your manager and colleagues informed of your goals and progress. You are in control.
soft_skills.justification: Being in control and informing others about progress demonstrates ownership and accountability.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on IT infrastructure management, system enhancement, and operational tasks. There is no mention of AI, ML, or Generative AI models, tasks, or technologies. The responsibilities clearly fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), specifically 'Software Development & Integration' and 'Operations & MLOps (LLMOps)' if it were more focused on deployment pipelines, but the core is system building and maintenance. Therefore, the 'Software Engineer' profile is the most appropriate.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on Linux infrastructure, system operations, and software development. There are no mentions of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward and unambiguous.
